# MTLMotionBorderMode.clamp

**Case**

A mode that specifies treating times outside the specified endpoint as if they were at the endpoint.

## Declaration

```swift
case clamp
```

## Specifying motion modes

- **MTLMotionBorderMode.vanish**: A mode that specifies that times outside the specified endpoint need to prevent any ray-intersections with the primitive.

items.description: A mode that specifies that times outside the specified endpoint need to prevent any ray-intersections with the primitive.
